# This file was automagically generated by mbed.org.
# If you would like to add your own targets, create a
# project.cmake file locally in your project directory.

CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.9)
set(BOARD_SELECT 767)
#set(BOARD_SELECT 746)
include(mbed/mbed_build_settings.cmake)

# here starts the project
PROJECT(MCOM_PRIVATE C CXX ASM)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

include(mbed/mbed_files.cmake)
include(f7_simple_udp/f7_simple_udp.cmake)


INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${PROJECT_NAME}
        f7_simple_udp
        f7_enc
        DAC-HAT
        DAC-HAT/AD5754R
)

# executable MCOM
ADD_EXECUTABLE(${PROJECT_NAME}
        ${libmbed_files}
        ${board_specific_files}
        ${series_specific_files}
        ${f7_simple_udp_files}
        main.cpp
        f7_simple_udp/f7eth.h
        f7_simple_udp/f7eth.cpp
        f7_enc/F7_enc.h
        DAC-HAT/DAC_HAT.cpp
        DAC-HAT/DAC_HAT.h
        DAC-HAT/AD5754R/AD5754R.cpp
        DAC-HAT/AD5754R/AD5754R.h
        dataStruct.h
        config.h
#        function.h
        )

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES ENABLE_EXPORTS 1)
# add syslibs dependencies to create the correct linker order
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECT_NAME} -lstdc++ -lsupc++ -lm -lc -lgcc -lnosys)

include(mbed/mbed_after_build.cmake)
